Title: KandaAlpha DDD Architecture - MVC, Dependency Injection, Repository and db4o
Description:
A  vs.net 2010 beta 1 solution which provides a sample domain drive design architecture  separated into Presentation, Application, Domain and Infrastructure layers. 

Technologies in use are visual studio 2010 beta  ASP.Net MVC 1.0, Entity Framework 4.0 and db4o.

Project Description
A vs.net 2010 beta 1 solution which provides a sample domain drive design architecture separated into Presentation, Application, Domain and Infrastructure layers.

Technologies in use are visual studio 2010 beta ASP.Net MVC 1.0, Entity Framework 4.0 and db4o.
